cyclone.name: ISAIAS
cyclone.current_location: about 100 mi (155 km) ESE of Jacksonville, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, then turning north-northeast parallel to the U.S. East Coast toward the Carolinas and Mid-Atlantic states
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: northeastern South Carolina or southern North Carolina coast (around South Santee River-Surf City)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Watch Hill RI to Stonington ME, including Martha’s Vineyard, Nantucket, and Block Island
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning Flagler/Volusia County Line FL northward to west of Watch Hill RI; Hurricane Warning South Santee River SC to Surf City NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire U.S. Atlantic coastline from east-central Florida northward to Maine
weather_observation.wind: Brief outer-rainband gusts occasionally reached near tropical-storm force (35–40 mph), but sustained winds remained mostly below 34 kt.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge of less than 1 ft possible along the Broward County coast; no significant inundation expected.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches of rainfall possible in squalls; localized street-level ponding only.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and rough surf affecting vessel approaches and pilot transfers.
